citation: Tasmanian Public Finance Corporation Amendment Act 2023 (Tas)
text:
Tasmanian Public Finance Corporation Amendment Act 2023

An Act to amend the Tasmanian Public Finance Corporation Act 1985 and to consequentially amend certain other Acts for related purposes
[Royal Assent 29 September 2023]

Be it enacted by Her Excellency the Governor of Tasmania, by and with the advice and consent of the Legislative Council and House of Assembly, in Parliament assembled, as follows:

PART 1 - Preliminary

1. Short title
    This Act may be cited as the Tasmanian Public Finance Corporation Amendment Act 2023 .

2. Commencement
    This Act commences on 1 July 2023 but, if this Act does not receive the Royal Assent by 1 July 2023, this Act is taken to have commenced on 1 July 2023.

3. Repeal of Act
    This Act is repealed on 1 July 2024.

PART 2 - Tasmanian Public Finance Corporation Act 1985 Amended

4.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Tasmanian Public Finance Corporation Act 1985 .

5.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Tasmanian Public Finance Corporation Act 1985 .

6.
